attributes.action: Don’t get involved in Russia & Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: Stop getting involved in the war because we can’t even deal with cost of living and inflation but the uk wants to take on Russia can we just be humble and stop risking the life’s of innocent people to win a war for the rich it’s a lose lose situation for the rest of us and we will not go to the front line for a country that doesn’t even respect us.
attributes.background: Stop trying to force the UK to be involved with Russia & Ukraine
